name: GPU Quiz Game! :3
description:
Answer the correct release date of the GPU! :D

This is my first ever short game! >.< It's just a test though. It was supposed to be a web game, but the link won't last forever. here, try out the web version if u don't wanna download it!

https://games.gdevelop-app.com/game-da179548-8cc0-423b-98bf-70bb1f44a7ae/index.h...

 it's a quiz game, so don't cheat. Be honest! they know... if u win u get free cookie! :D Pls share with ur friends, hope u guys like it! 

thank u! :3
